title: Flowchart
alt: The way out is to use the marker you have to add a box that says 'get a marker' to the line between you and 'start', then add a 'no' line from the trap box to 'end'.
transcript:
[A flow chart is shown with two boxes and two arrows. The first box rectangular:] 
Start[From the first box there is a short arrow straight down to a diamond shaped box:]
Hey, wait, this flowchart is a trap![An arrow continues down below from the bottom corner of the diamond box, where there is labeled, and quickly it turns left (in the direction of the arrow), going out under the diamond and then turns left two more times to end up on the right corner of the same box where the arrow points back again.]
Yes
